Description: Indicate the consent group for the individual, provided by the data contributor's data dictionary
Indicate the geographic region for the individual (shown as ex. "840")
Whether the individual has been diagnosed with a condition or disease (physical and/or cognitive), \True" indicates the individual has been diagnosed"
A coded value specifying the self-declared ethnic origination independent of racial origination, provided by the data contributor's data dictionary
Name of the field center
The taxonomic ranking including both species and subspecies the individual belongs to.
Unique identifier for the study, assigned by the DCC
Indicate which longitudinal visit for the individual the data comes from, provided by the data contributor's data dictionary
Indicate the disease or condition.
Valid Values: AD-DS, Affective Disorder, Alzheimer Disease, Alzheimer disease with psychosis, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, anxiety, Autism Spectrum Disorder, Bipolar Disorder, Bladder Cancer, Brain Cancer, Breast Cancer, Cervical Cancer, Colon Cancer, control, corticobasal degeneration disorder, CS-DS, dementia, dystonia, essential tremor, Fibrocystic Breast Disease, frontotemporal dementia, gliosis, hypoxia, Juvenile Myelomonocytic Leukemia, Leukemia, Lewy body disease, Longevity, Lung Cancer, Major Depressive Disorder, MCI-DS, mild cognitive impairment, multiple system atrophy, Neurofibromatosis 1, Neurofibromatosis 2, no cognitive impairment, Not Applicable, obesity, obsessive compulsive disorder, Ovary Cancer, Pancreatic Cancer, Parkinson's disease, pathological aging, progressive supranuclear palsy, Prostate Cancer, Schizophrenia, Skin Cancer, Substance Related Disorder, Tourette Syndrome, traumatic brain injury, type 2 diabetes mellitus, vascular dementia, Williams Syndrome

Description: Ethnicity of individual
Valid Values: Hispanic or Latino,Not Hispanic or Latino,Not applicable,Not collected,Other ethnicity,Prefer not to answer,Unknown

Description: Race of individual
Valid Values: American Indian or Alaska Native,Ashkenazi Jewish,Asian,Black or African American,Multiracial,Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander,Not collected,Not applicable,Other race,Prefer not to answer,Unknown,White

Description: The biological sex of the individual
Age of the individual (age in years of the individual at first recorded study event (enrollment, visit, observation, sample collection, survey completion, etc.)
Name of the cohort the individual belongs to
Valid Values: Arivale Scientific Wellness Study (SWS), Cardiovascular Health Study (CHS), Centenarian, Denmark Family, Not applicable, Not collected, Not specified, Other, Study of Osteoporotic Fractures (SOF), SuperAgers Family Study, The Health Aging and Body Composition Studay (HealthABC), The Osteoporotic Fractures in Men (MrOS) Study, Unknown, US Family

Description: The datafile and/or individualID includes cognitive variables and/or scores from the Activities of daily living (ADLs)
The datafile and/or individualID includes cognitive variables and/or scores from the Cognitive Abilities Screening Instrument (CASI)
The datafile and/or individualID includes cognitive variables and/or scores from the The Clinical Dementia Rating (CDR)
The datafile and/or individualID includes cognitive variables and/or scores from the Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE)
The datafile and/or individualID includes cognitive variables and/or scores from the Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA)
Identifying string linked to the individual or animal being studied, provided by the data contributor
